entry.title: my first blog
entry.content:
About the blog

A new gTLD is open to registering, it is really an ugly suffix(.pw). But I love new things, so I had this domain name registered.

It’s aimed to blog something about web security here though I don’t know too much about it. I hope it would trace my learning’s curve, but meanwhile not annoying you guys who run into here. So I decide to write most of it in chinese except this piece ;)

Who am I

I’m just a Perler learning Ruby and Rails these days. Love progarmming, web app developing and thinking day & dreames.

Enjoy the words from Perldoc for perlstyle : Be nice. Be consistent.

THX~
